words.source: H2388 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of חָזַק 'to be strong'; KJV 'was hardened', ESV 'was hardened', NASB 'was hardened'

H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H3808 waw + neg. part. loʾ 'not'; KJV 'neither would he', ESV 'and he did not', NASB 'and he did not'
H7971 Piel perf. 3ms of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'let … go', ESV 'let … go', NASB 'let … go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1121 n.mp constr. ben 'son'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 proper name Yisraʾel 'Israel'; all trans. agree
H834 prep. k- + rel. pron. ʾasher 'as, just as'; KJV 'as', ESV 'just as', NASB 'just as'

H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
